channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: You get the satisfaction of a job well done and the blog title "Scholar of Scarlet Architecture". Which is nice.
item.content:encoded: You get the satisfaction of a job well done and the blog title “Scholar of Scarlet Architecture”. Which is nice.

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description: So, don't I get a prize? Or something?
item.content:encoded: So, don’t I get a prize? Or something?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Yarrr, tis the chapel of ye olde Scarlet Monastery, home of the never-dropping gear ye swabs desired in yer level 30s.
Good shot Brian, ye stumped a few of 'em.
item.content:encoded:
Yarrr, tis the chapel of ye olde Scarlet Monastery, home of the never-dropping gear ye swabs desired in yer level 30s.

Good shot Brian, ye stumped a few of ’em.

item.title: By: Acid
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.description:
hmmm it could be brill. but now looking closer at the actual building, its that white marble texture used in all of the tombs throughout trisfall-WPL/EPL
it couldn't be..... It couldn't be the tomb in Deathknell could it? The tomb UD start in?
item.content:encoded:
hmmm it could be brill. but now looking closer at the actual building, its that white marble texture used in all of the tombs throughout trisfall-WPL/EPL

it couldn’t be….. It couldn’t be the tomb in Deathknell could it? The tomb UD start in?

item.title: By: Papa
item.dc:creator: Papa
item.description: I'd have thought Brill in Tirisfal.

item.title: By: Brian
item.dc:creator: Brian
item.description:
If I hadn't taken it...
Id tell you. =P
But it seems to have caused the confusion I was going for.
item.content:encoded:
If I hadn’t taken it…

Id tell you. =P

But it seems to have caused the confusion I was going for.

item.title: By: Dimble
item.dc:creator: Dimble
item.description: I'm hoping Dion04 is joking because otherwise damn, that was dumb.
item.content:encoded: I’m hoping Dion04 is joking because otherwise damn, that was dumb.

item.title: By: Acid
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.description: I dunno, I don't remember the skies areound SM having that greenesk hue to them. I'm thinking either the church in Tiers Hand (EPL) or possible even Alerian Stronghold in terrokar? Though I doubt it's the latter. Definetly Scarlet design.
item.content:encoded: I dunno, I don’t remember the skies areound SM having that greenesk hue to them. I’m thinking either the church in Tiers Hand (EPL) or possible even Alerian Stronghold in terrokar? Though I doubt it’s the latter. Definetly Scarlet design.

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: no way. stormwind doesn't have tattered flags and gothic spikes. i'm going with SM too.
item.content:encoded: no way. stormwind doesn’t have tattered flags and gothic spikes. i’m going with SM too.
